committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office Building located at 809 Nueces Bay Boulevard in Corpus Christi, Texas, as the "Dr. Hector Perez Garcia Post Office Building".

summary.text: Designates the United States Post Office Building in Corpus Christi, Texas, as the Dr. Hector Perez Garcia Post Office Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Post Office Building located at 809 Nueces Bay Boulevard in Corpus Christi, Texas, as the "Dr. Hector Perez Garcia Post Office Building".
